pickOne: **Lawful** - Deny mercy to a criminal or unbeliever.
**Good** - Endanger yourself to protect someone weaker than you.

title: Race
pickOne: Human - When you **pray for guidance, even for a moment and ask "what here is evil?"** the GM will tell you, honestly.

title: Quest
description: When you **dedicate yourself to a mission** through prayer and ritual cleansing, state what you set out to do:
